examType: Entrance Exam for MBA, PGDM, MCA
conductingBody: Karnataka Post Graduate Private Colleges' Association (KPPGCA)
eligibility: Candidates must have a Bachelor's degree with a minimum of 50% marks (45% for SC/ST candidates) in aggregate from a recognized university. Final year students are also eligible.

faqs.question: Is KMAT Karnataka accepted outside Karnataka?
faqs.answer: KMAT Karnataka is primarily for admission to management and computer application programs in Karnataka, but the exam is open to candidates from all states of India.
